about_the_game:
The Dash 8 Q400 is the largest regional airliner of the Q Series and can seat up to 86 passengers. Powered by two 5000 shp turboprop engines and six-bladed all-composite propellers, the Q400 has a cruise speed of 360 knots and can climb up to flight level FL270. Maximum range is over 1100 nautical miles. The modern cockpit features 5 large screen LCDs and is equipped with the latest avionics systems. More than 500 units of the Q400 have been built since 1999.

The Q400 for Aerofly FS 2 features realistic flight dynamics, a detailed auto flight system and an accurate turboprop engine simulation.
detailed_description:
The Dash 8 Q400 is the largest regional airliner of the Q Series and can seat up to 86 passengers. Powered by two 5000 shp turboprop engines and six-bladed all-composite propellers, the Q400 has a cruise speed of 360 knots and can climb up to flight level FL270. Maximum range is over 1100 nautical miles. The modern cockpit features 5 large screen LCDs and is equipped with the latest avionics systems. More than 500 units of the Q400 have been built since 1999.

The Q400 for Aerofly FS 2 features realistic flight dynamics, a detailed auto flight system and an accurate turboprop engine simulation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 compatible 3D graphic card with at least 2 GB of RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU by NVIDIA or AMD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Aerofly FS 2 - Q400

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 compatible 3D graphic card with at least 2 GB of RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard

short_description: One of the most famous turboprop regional airliners, the Dash 8 Q400 for Aerofly FS 2 features realistic flight dynamics, a detailed auto flight system and avionics system as well as an accurate turboprop engine simulation. The Dash 8 Q400 is the largest regional airliner of the Q Series and can seat up to 86 passengers.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French
*languages with full audio support
